Successfully launched the Asian business unit of Gandi and responsible for it since then.Succeed in accreditation of various regional domain name registries (notable .CN/.TW) on behalf of Gandi in France.Hired and trained a multilingual customer care team to provide high class customer support around the clock and launched Gandi's website in Simplified and Traditional Chinese. while42 is a worldwide French Tech Engineer Network. We are the alumni association that francophone tech engineers deserve. Today with 30+ chapters in the world and 1500+ members. For more information see http://while42.org/I'm co-managing while42 Taipei group with Mose. You can add me on Linkedin and send me a message if you meet the membership criteria (cf http://while42.org/) and want to join our community in Taipei.

The European Chamber of Commerce Taiwan (ECCT) promotes the interests of European companies operating in Taiwan through proactive engagement with government and institutions and by providing a platform for business networking and development opportunities.

Thomas oversaw the launch and built Gandi’s Asia office with hard work, determination, and grit. He was dedicated to making sure that Gandi’s interfaces, printed materials, and communication were perfectly adapted to the Asian market. He advised on everything from the use of Chinese typography, appropriate color usage, and specificities in properly adapting our design guidelines. It’s due to Thomas that we managed a smooth launch of Gandi’s services, while avoiding common pitfalls in such an ambitious undertaking. He is knowledgeable, dependable, and it was a pleasure working with him!
